room_title: Escape room "The Dinner Party" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: We did The Dinner Party and it was so much fun. We had a great time with 6. The clues were helpful but didn't give anything away. I plan to go back for more bracelets. Highly recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "The Dinner Party" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: We had a fantastic time. Let me tell you an hour goes by so fast trying to figure out all the puzzles. We did the Dinner Party and we're just short of finishing but we're hooked and looking forward to our next adventure at Locked Manhattan.

room_title: Escape room "The Dinner Party" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: We came so close to solving the Dinner Party! We had 8 people and it was a blast. Looking forward to trying out the other rooms soon. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Dinner Party" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: The Dinner Party room was challenging and fun! The staff was very nice! I loved every bit of it! I will most definitely be back, probably with a bigger group!

room_title: Escape room "The Dinner Party" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: My family and I had a blast! We did the "Dinner Party" room and made it out with just minutes to spare! I've been to a few of these challenges around Kansas now. This one ranks up there with rooms I've done in Kansas City. It was professional with some definite "Aha!" moments and use of technology. I'm going again next time I'm in town!
